statements: SELECT * FROM GroupProjectData
SELECT id, student_name, project_id, sql_script FROM GroupProjectData
SELECT student_name, project_id FROM GroupProjectData
SELECT * FROM GroupProjectData WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT id, student_name FROM GroupProjectData WHERE student_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM GroupProjectData WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_name, project_id FROM GroupProjectData WHERE id = 3
SELECT sql_script FROM GroupProjectData WHERE project_id = 2 AND id > 5
SELECT id, student_name FROM GroupProjectData WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM GroupProjectData WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT student_id, sql_script, Students.student_name FROM ProjectScripts JOIN Students ON ProjectScripts.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id > 2 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT email, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email_address FROM Students ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT project_id, project_name, created_by FROM Projects WHERE created_by = 1;
SELECT script_name, script_content FROM SQLScripts WHERE uploaded_by = 2 ORDER BY script_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email_address, project_name FROM Students JOIN Projects ON Students.project_id = Projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_name, email_address FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE created_by = 2
SELECT script_name, script_content FROM SQLScripts WHERE uploaded_by = 3 ORDER BY script_id
SELECT s.student_name, p.project_name, sc.script_name FROM Students s JOIN Projects p ON s.project_id = p.project_id JOIN SQLScripts sc ON sc.project_id = p.project_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, description FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_id, script_content FROM Projects INNER JOIN SQLScripts ON Projects.project_id = SQLScripts.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, description FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT script_content FROM SQLScripts WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY script_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, student_name, status FROM Projects p JOIN Collaborations c ON p.project_id = c.project_id JOIN Students s ON c.student_id = s.student_id WHERE c.status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT script_id, script_name, author_id FROM SQLScripts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT student_id, project_id FROM Collaborations WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT script_name, author_id, created_at FROM SQLScripts ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT collaboration_id, student_name, project_name FROM Collaborations INNER JOIN Students ON Collaborations.student_id = Students.student_id INNER JOIN Projects ON Collaborations.project_id = Projects.project_id;
